member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Interactive.InteractiveEvaluator.ProcessStarting(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Interactive.InteractiveHostOptions)
member.summary: Invoked by when a new process is being started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Implementation.Interactive.CommandArgumentsParser.ParsePath(System.String,System.Int32@,System.String@)
member.summary: Parses an optional path argument. Path is a double-quoted string with no escapes.
member.param: The path (might be incomplete if closing quote is missing) or null if the argument is missing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Implementation.Interactive.CommandArgumentsParser.ParseTrailingTrivia(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Parses an optional trailing single-line C# comment, whitespace and line breaks.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Implementation.Interactive.CommandArgumentsParser.ParseQuotedString(System.String,System.Int32@,System.String@)
member.summary: Parses an optional double-quoted string argument. The string may contain backslash-escaped quotes and backslashes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Implementation.Interactive.InertClassifierProvider
member.summary: A classifier provider that caches the classification results from actual classifiers and stores it on the text buffer so they can be used from that point on. Used for interactive buffers that have been reset but which we still want to look good.
